Class
Description

BankExceptionHandler

User
This is User entity which maps to 'user' table in database

UserController layer to communicate with UserService

This is UserController system integration test
UsernameAlreadyExists
Thrown when 'username' already exists
UserNotFoundException
Thrown when 'ID' is passed and user not found
UserRepository
User repository to provide JPA functionalities
UserService
UserService to communicate with UserRepository This contains business logic to perform CRUD operation on User entity
UserServiceIntegrationTest
UserService integration test with UserRepository
UserServiceUnitTest
Testing of each method of UserService layer.
